DuckDuckGo

DuckDuckGo is an American software company focused on online privacy whose flagship product is a search engine named DuckDuckGo. Founded by Gabriel Weinberg in 2008, its later products include browser extensions and a custom DuckDuckGo web browser. Headquartered in Paoli, Pennsylvania, DuckDuckGo is a privately held company with about 200 employees. The company's name is a reference to the children's game duck, duck, goose. More at Wikipedia

DuckDuckGo - Protection. Privacy. Peace of mind.

The DuckDuckGo browser's built-in Scam Blocker guards against phishing sites, malware, and other common online scams. It's free, anonymous, and on by default, so you're protected as soon as you open the browser.
